answer:
The question is "where is mali located".

The text information tells us that Mali is located in West Africa and is part of mordland states. It also states that Mali is contained in the administrative territorial entity of Central Mali. So, the answer is:

Mali is located in West Africa, in the administrative territorial entity of Central Mali.
